verses.verse: <S%G80>Brothers,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G4301>overtaken<s%> in a <S%G3900>fault,<s%> you <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G4152>spiritual,<s%> <S%G2675>restore<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> an one in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>meekness;<s%> <S%G4648>considering<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G3985>tempted.<s%>
For <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> himself to be <S%G5100>something,<s%> when he is <S%G3367>nothing,<s%> he <S%G5422>deceives<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

But let <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1381>prove<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> shall he <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2745>rejoicing<s%> in <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> and not in <S%G2087>another.<s%>
Let him that is <S%G2727>taught<s%> in the <S%G4487>word<s%> <S%G2841>communicate<s%> to him that <S%G2727>teaches<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> things.

Be not <S%G4105>deceived;<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G3456>mocked:<s%> for <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4687>sows,<s%> that shall he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2325>reap.<s%>

For he that <S%G4687>sows<s%> to his <S%G4561>flesh<s%> shall of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5356>corruption;<s%> but he that <S%G4687>sows<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> shall of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>everlasting.<s%>
And let us not be <S%G1573>weary<s%> in <S%G2570>well<s%> <S%G4160>doing:<s%> for in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%> we shall <S%G2325>reap,<s%> if we <S%G1590>faint<s%> not.

As we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G685>therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2540>opportunity,<s%> let us <S%G2038>do<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G3122>especially<s%> to them who are of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
You <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4080>how<s%> <S%G4080>large<s%> a <S%G1121>letter<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> to you with <S%G1699>my<s%> own <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

As <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2146>make<s%> a <S%G2146>fair<s%> <S%G2146>show<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> they <S%G315>constrain<s%> you to be <S%G4059>circumcised;<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should <S%G1377>suffer<s%> <S%G1377>persecution<s%> for the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For <S%G3761>neither<s%> they <S%G846>themselves<s%> who are <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law;<s%> but <S%G2309>desire<s%> to have you <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> that they may <S%G2744>glory<s%> in <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

But <S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid<s%> <S%G1096><s%> that I should <S%G2744>glory,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> in the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G4717>crucified<s%> to me, and I to the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

And as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G4748>walk<s%> according to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2583>rule,<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G1909>on<s%> them, and <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and on the <S%G2474>Israel<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

From now <S%G3063>on<s%> let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2873>trouble<s%> <S%G3930><s%> me: for I <S%G941>bear<s%> in my <S%G4983>body<s%> the <S%G4742>marks<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G4151>spirit.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> To the Galatians written from Rome.
